item.title: Getting the Website Started
item.description: These are the steps I used to get my web site running. Use RStudio and blogdown to create the computer instructions for the site. Use github to store those computer instructions on the internet Use Netify to host and build the website Use Godaddy to register the domain (would just use any registerar)
